title: Ticket #2117: better-analyze chokes on backslashes in attribute values (bad for win)
description:
in the function toNewClassAd in classad_analysis/conversion.cpp, the conversion is done by serializing the old classad into a string and then parsing it using new classads.

the process of serializing and then parsing the result apparently does not work when backslashes are present in the values of any classad attributes. on windows, it is common to have a backslash in paths, like Cmd, Iwd, etc.
creator: zmiller
